issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: DR for function Binaries on HDFS

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description:
Stacktrace:
java.lang.AssertionError: 
Expected: is "hdfs://somehost:9000/someBasePath/withADir/replicaDbName/somefunctionname/9223372036854775807/ab.jar"
     but: was "hdfs://somehost:9000/someBasePath/withADir/replicadbname/somefunctionname/0/ab.jar"
	at org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat(MatcherAssert.java:20)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertThat(Assert.java:865)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertThat(Assert.java:832)
	at org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse.repl.load.message.PrimaryToReplicaResourceFunctionTest.createDestinationPath(PrimaryToReplicaResourceFunctionTest.java:82)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)

	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)

Linux 9efcdb4d8880 3.19.0-37-generic #42-Ubuntu SMP Fri Nov 20 18:22:05 UTC 2015 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

comments.body:
The failure is due to the mocked class System returns 0 for call System.nanoTime().
In createDestinationPath() the mock should be on System.nanoTime() and not System.currentTimeMillis().

Also the destination DB name in expected path should be lower case.
Otherwise fails with:
  PrimaryToReplicaResourceFunctionTest.createDestinationPath:82
Expected: is "hdfs://somehost:9000/someBasePath/withADir/replicaDbName/somefunctionname/9223372036854775807/ab.jar"
     but: was "hdfs://somehost:9000/someBasePath/withADir/replicadbname/somefunctionname/9223372036854775807/ab.jar"
Attaching a patch with the changes in test method.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12871826/HIVE-16843.patch
